title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Adaptive Learning Strategies for Personalized Learning Path Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Online Learning Utilization Skills and Foundational Social Studies Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously design personalized learning pathways using an adaptive learning platform based on a recommendation system

Learners can analyze their learning progress and revise strategies by comparing themselves with peer learners
